mapper.select: select a.* from bsc_user_t a where a.user_code=#{user_code}

select d.parent_id as parent_id, (select menu_name from bsc_menu_t where menu_id = d.parent_id) as parent_name, d.menu_id as menu_id, d.menu_name as menu_name, d.Menu_Url as url, d.Menu_Order as menu_order, d.Permission as permission from bsc_menu_t d where d.Menu_Status = '1' and Is_Show = '1' and d.Menu_Id in (select c.Menu_Id from bsc_role_menu_t c where c.Role_Id in (select b.Role_Id from bsc_user_role_t b where b.User_Id = #{userId})) order by d.parent_id asc, d.menu_id asc

select b.menu_id, b.menu_name, b.Parent_Id, (select distinct 1 from (select d.menu_id as menu_id from bsc_role_menu_t d, bsc_menu_t e where d.role_id in (select a.role_id from bsc_user_role_t a where a.user_id = #{user_Id}) and d.menu_id = e.menu_id and e.Is_Show = '0' and e.Parent_Id = #{parent_id}) c where c.menu_id = b.menu_id) as ishaveBtn from bsc_menu_t b where b.Parent_Id = #{parent_id} and b.Is_Show = '0';

select d.parent_id as parent_id, (select menu_name from bsc_menu_t where menu_id = d.parent_id) as parent_name, d.menu_id as menu_id, d.menu_name as menu_name, d.Menu_Url as url, d.Icon as icon, d.Is_Show as is_show, d.Menu_Order as menu_order, d.Permission as permission from bsc_menu_t d where d.Menu_Status = '1' and Is_Show = '0' and d.Menu_Id in (select c.Menu_Id from bsc_role_menu_t c where c.Role_Id in (select b.Role_Id from bsc_user_role_t b where b.User_Id = #{userId})) order by d.parent_id asc, d.menu_id asc
